title: Android Auto’s latest beta brings full Android game support
snippets: Google is introducing gaming support to Android Auto, allowing games like Candy Crush Soda Saga and Angry Birds 2 to be played on compatible car touchscreens. This feature is part of the Android 14.1 beta version, currently available to testers, with four games supported at launch.

title: A genetic tree as a movie: Moving beyond the still portrait of ancestry

title: Cartilage and bone development: Three paths to skeleton formation
snippets: Researchers have found that in vertebrates, skeletal cells from various body regions originate from different precursor cells and have distinct gene regulation. This variation in gene regulation among skeletal cells could be crucial to vertebrates' evolutionary success.
